text: Ezɨ bar mɨzaraghara Elisan ingangarir gumazim dɨkavigha dɨpenimɨn azenan ghu. Egha a garima, Sirian mɨdorozir gumaziba uan hoziaba ko karisba sara nguibar ekiam ekɨarugha gɨfa. Egha a ghua kamaghɨn Elisa mɨgei, “Ame! Gumazir ekiam, Sirian mɨdorozir gumaziba e ekɨarugha gɨfa. E manmaghɨn damuam?”
